body: Ouroboras comment made me puke a little

I highly recommend this one for all those who want to see revenge plots and no NTR,there is rape and blackmail but it's still gud.There are more chapters if you go to their site BUT it's missing several chapters 20-xx something and misses out alot of plot so I suggest you wait here and hope to get the missing chapters here.
Korea has always been extremely classist, and with the rise of kpop it became even more prominent
Damn wtf they find anything to ridicule you in Korea huh. Crazy can’t even go to a uni that’s not in the city smh

This is currently a short work, but I know that Koreans enjoy NTR just as much as the rest of us. Lets all cross our fingers and hope that this series turns into something great. Webtoons have really opened the door for NTR to reach a wider audience. They are produce quicker than Japanese works and South Korea is more strict than Japan. So, I know that after work that they just want to come back home and 🍆fap🍆 to some good old fashion NTR on their phone.
